title: State of Decay - Year One Survival Edition incl. update 1 -  3DM
description:
Update 1 is pre-applied.
If you're only looking the update, read the notes towards the bottom.

Instructions
1. Copy 'State of Decay YOSE' folder to C:Program Files
2. (optional)Change UserName= in '3DMGAME.ini' to whatever
3. (optional)Right click 'StateOfDecay.exe' and send to Desktop twice.
4. (optional)Rename desktop shortcut to State Of Decay and drag into C:ProgramDataMicrosoftWindowsStart MenuPrograms
5. (optional)Rename shortcut on desktop to State Of Decay


NOTE:
If you only came to download the 3DM update files, you need to download the following and copy to your installation directory:
StateOfDecay.exe
3DMGAME.ini
steam_api.dll

CODEX and other users:
You will not be able to use your existing save files with Update 1 from 3DM.
If you want to use your existing saves, try this cracked update 1 exe on its own:
I don't know if it works but worth a try.
OR try the above 3DM update and move about your saves & try make it work, again I don't know if it'll work.
I'd appreciate it if you could let us know what works for you, then I can edit this description
